meta.notes: Status values are for demonstration purposes only and do not represent an official FedRAMP authorization.

KSI-IAM-01.summary: Multi-factor authentication is enforced for all privileged and remote access users.

KSI-IAM-02.summary: User accounts are provisioned, reviewed, and deprovisioned according to documented procedures.

KSI-LOG-01.summary: Centralized audit logging is enabled and logs are retained according to policy.

KSI-VULN-01.summary: Automated vulnerability scanning is in place, but remediation SLAs are still being finalized.

KSI-ASSET-01.summary: An inventory of in-scope system assets is maintained and reviewed regularly.

KSI-IR-01.summary: An incident response plan exists, but no evidence of recent testing or tabletop exercises was found.
